Name: Apricot Fizz
Ingredients: 60 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.
Review: This low-alcohol, refreshing cocktail is perfect for a summer afternoon.
Nutrition: One serving of Apricot Fizz contains 148 calories
